import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'] }) export class EventosComponent implements OnInit { public eventos: any; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit() { this.getEventos(); } public getEventos(): void{ this.eventos = this.http.get('https://localhost:7250/eventos').subscribe( response => this.eventos = response, error => console.log(error) ); } }
